snippet: The arrest of a man on charges of threatening a county official was not connected to the killings of two prosecutors in Kaufman County, officials said.
abstract: Law enforcement officials in Kaufman, Tex, investigating killings of prosecutors Mike McLelland and Mark E Hasse say they have arrested Nick Morale of nearby Terrell on charges of threatening county official; say he is not connected to shootings.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and SERGE F. KOVALESKI
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Kaufman, and Serge F. Kovaleski from Dallas. Michael S. Schmidt contributed reporting from Washington, and Sheelagh McNeill and Jack Begg contributed research.

lead_paragraph: The arrest of a man on charges of threatening a county official was not connected to the killings of two prosecutors in Kaufman County, officials said.

headline.seo: Officials Say Arrest Is Unrelated to Texas Killings
headline.main: Officials Say Arrest Is Unrelated to Texas Killings
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Arrest of Man Is Unrelated To Killings
